definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: overcome (cf. Ar. ra0na (y), c. 9ly or b pers., overcome, e.g. of wine);—assumed in Heb. by Thes (after LXX) and most mod. to explain

definitions.title: Hithpō‘.
definitions.body: Pt. [[כְּגִבּוֹר מִתְרוֹנֵן מִיׇּ֑יִן]] Ps 78:65 like a hero overcome by wine (cf. ‖ v:a); AV RV De Che al. shout (√[[רנן]]), cf. Targum; so Hup-Now, with altern. conj. [[מִתְעוֹרֵר]], and this sense more suitable (cf. Luzzatto:Il Pentateuco iii (1874), 162 (Le 21:7) Perles:79).—Pr 29:6 v. [[רנן]], [[רוץ]]. p. 930, 943
